description: Gets Active Directory user, computer, and service accounts.
name: search_ad_account

args.description: Arguments to pass to the Search-ADAccount PowerShell cmdlet.

cmdlet_credential_name.description: Name of credentials from this pack\'s configuration to use in the cmdlet execution for the -Credential argument. If not specified then no -Credential argument will be passed.

cmdlet_password.description: Optional override of the password in <cmdlet_credential_name>.

cmdlet_username.description: Optional override of the username in <cmdlet_credential_name> (example: username@domain.tld).

credential_name.description: Name of credentials from this pack's configuration to use when connecting to <hostname>.

hostname.description: Remote host to execute the command on

output.description: Output format of data turned by cmdlet (json, raw). Unspecified defaults to value in config.

password.description: Optional override of the password in <credential_name>.

port.description: Port used when connecting to windows host via WinRM (standard is 5986)

transport.description: Transport used when connecting to windows host via WinRM (basic, plaintext, certificate, ssl, kerberos, ntlm, credssp)

username.description: Optional override of the username in <credential_name> (example: username@domain.tld).
